p: For qRT-PCR validation, all RNA samples were reverse transcribed into first-strand cDNA using Superscript III 1st strand RT-PCR reactions according to the manufacturer's protocol (Invitrogen, USA). Amplifications were carried out in triplicate in a total volume of 20 μL using SYBR Premix Ex Taq™ II kit (Takara). The specificity of the PCR amplicon was checked using a heat dissociation protocol (from 60 to 95°C) after the final PCR cycle. Three independent biological replicates and three technical replicates were performed. The primers used in the qPCR were shown in File S12 and the ACT2 gene was used as internal control to normalize the expression.
